creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Stephen Addiss and Audrey Seo, ex. Luise K. Addiss Collection
description: thin, tall shoots of bamboo with delicate foliage; shoots in foreground painted in black, those in back ground grey; gold silk mount
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

LRQ: [ 籜筍栄竹 ] LRQ: [ 東山隠士 ]
title: New Shoots of Flourishing Bamboo
